testcase.name: I want to get a list of all Regions
testcase.system-out: Given I have a list of Regions created in my database.......................passed When I call the GET “Regions - All” endpoint................................passed Then I get a 200 response...................................................passed And I get the correct list of Regions.......................................passed

testcase.name: I want to add a Likes to a Wine
testcase.system-out: Given I have a Wine created in my database..................................passed When I call the POST “Wines - Like” endpoint with a valid Id and valid Payload.passed Then I get a 200 response...................................................passed And the selected option is saved............................................passed
